instructions_to_main_agent: 1. IMPORT FONTS: Add the Manrope import to the top of /app/frontend/src/index.css immediately.
2. UPDATE TAILWIND: Update /app/frontend/tailwind.config.js to include the custom colors (brand_gold, brand_silver) in the theme.extend.colors section.
3. LAYOUT: Use the 'Bento Grid' strategy for the Dashboard. Do not create a boring list of cards. Mix sizes.
4. FORMS: For the Loan Creation, use a multi-step approach or a clean grid layout for the 'Item Details' to handle multiple items without clutter.
5. TABLES: Use the 'Table' component for Active Loans. Ensure columns are aligned correctly (numbers right-aligned).
6. AUTH: Use the 'login_bg' image for the Authentication page split layout (Image on Left/Right, Form on other side).
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all inputs and buttons (e.g., 'login-email-input', 'create-loan-btn').
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
